name: splice-up
description: A tool to speed up and join multiple videos

scripts.package-win: npm run build && electron-packager . SpliceUp --overwrite --ignore="(ffmpeg|ffprobe|doc/|src/|\.mp4$|\.babel|\.eslint|\.gitignore|package-lock\.json|webpack)" --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --icon=src/static/icon/icon.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds && npm run ffbin -- -p=win-64 -o=release-builds/SpliceUp-win32-x64
scripts.package-mac: npm run build && electron-packager . --overwrite --ignore="(ffmpeg|ffprobe|doc/|src/|\.mp4$|\.babel|\.eslint|\.gitignore|package-lock\.json|webpack)" --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --icon=src/static/icon/icon.icns --prune=true --out=release-builds && npm run ffbin -- -p=mac -o=release-builds/splice-up-darwin-x64
scripts.package-linux: npm run build && electron-packager . SpliceUp --overwrite --ignore="(ffmpeg|ffprobe|doc/|src/|\.mp4$|\.babel|\.eslint|\.gitignore|package-lock\.json|webpack)" --asar=true --platform=linux --arch=x64 --icon=src/static/icon/icon.png --prune=true --out=release-builds && npm run ffbin -- -p=linux-64 -o=release-builds/SpliceUp-linux-x64

author: Tyson Ngo
